name: v25.11.0-trunk.113
body:
Armbian rolling releases


- rolling releases are available at the bottom of official download pages - How to change type of images that are provided by Armbian? - How to switch between stable and rolling release? Please note that Armbian Rolling Releases are not recommended for production environments, as these builds are not thoroughly tested. However, in most cases, they should work well.

Weekly Digest

  • board: nanopct6: split and refactor patches for rockchip-6.12. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8550
  • config/desktop: point sid links to trixie instead of bookworm. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8559
  • Extension: UFS for image generation pipeline. by @HeyMeco in armbian/build#8474
  • Fix minor typo in sun8i-h616-fixup.scr to correct PH and PI port parse. by @YaoFei509 in armbian/build#8543
  • lib / kernel-make.sh: drop undefined make_filter call. Closes #8529. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8549
  • meson64: bump kernel to 6.16. by @retro98boy in armbian/build#8562
  • patch/kernel: update docs URI in a number of overlay READMEs. by @leggewie in armbian/build#8552
  • Radxa Zero 3: fix bluetooth, for edge & current, switch to u-boot master. by @twwn in armbian/build#8511
  • realtek led patch update. by @retro98boy in armbian/build#8563
  • rockchip64: fix compilation issues for kernel 6.12. by @SuperKali in armbian/build#8554
  • Set `Work in progress` label for maintainers synhronization. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8551
  • sunxi-6.12: Switching to v6.12.43. by @The-going in armbian/build#8541
  • Update current cb1-overlay.patch. by @YaoFei509 in armbian/build#8546
  • Update logo that is b/w compatible. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8553
  • Update rockchip v4l2 related patches due to upstream changes. by @igorpecovnik in armbian/build#8555
  • When updating u-boot on Rockchip64 to NVMe, script fails. by @StephanStS in armbian/build#8556
